properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The parent of the DocumentPreference (a Application or Document).
properties.name: parent

properties.description: A collection of events.
properties.name: events

properties.description: A collection of event listeners.
properties.name: eventListeners

properties.description: The height of the page.
properties.name: pageHeight

properties.description: The width of the page.
properties.name: pageWidth

properties.description: The page orientation.
properties.name: pageOrientation

properties.description: The color of the column guides, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255 and representing R, G, and B values,, or as a UI color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator.
properties.name: columnGuideColor

properties.description: The color of the margin guides, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255, representing R, G, and B values, or as a UI color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator.
properties.name: marginGuideColor

properties.description: If true, the document A-master has primary text frames when a new document is created.
properties.name: createPrimaryTextFrame

properties.description: The number of pages in the document. (Range: 1 to 9999)
properties.name: pagesPerDocument

properties.description: If true, the document has facing pages.
properties.name: facingPages

properties.description: The amount to offset the top document bleed.
properties.name: documentBleedTopOffset

properties.description: The amount to offset the bottom document bleed. Note: To set the bleed bottom offset, document bleed uniform size must be false.
properties.name: documentBleedBottomOffset

properties.description: The amount to offset the inside or left document bleed. Note: To set the bleed inside or left offset, document bleed uniform size must be false.
properties.name: documentBleedInsideOrLeftOffset

properties.description: The amount to offset the outside or right document bleed. Note: To set the bleed outside or right offset, document bleed uniform size must be false.
properties.name: documentBleedOutsideOrRightOffset

properties.description: If true, uses the document bleed top offset value for bleed offset measurements on all sides of the document. The default setting is true.
properties.name: documentBleedUniformSize

properties.description: The amount to offset the top slug.
properties.name: slugTopOffset

properties.description: The amount to offset the bottom slug. Note: To set the slug bottom offset, document slug uniform size must be false.
properties.name: slugBottomOffset

properties.description: The amount to offset the inside or left slug. Note: To set the slug inside or left offset, document slug uniform size must be false.
properties.name: slugInsideOrLeftOffset

properties.description: The amount to offset the outside or right slug. Note: To set the slug right or outside offset, document slug uniform size must be false.
properties.name: slugRightOrOutsideOffset

properties.description: If true, uses the slug top offset value for slug measurements on all sides of the document. The default value is false.
properties.name: documentSlugUniformSize

properties.description: If true, preserves the layout of spreads that contained more than two pages when allow page shuffle was turned on. If false, changes multi-page spreads to two-page spreads if the spreads were created or changed since allow page shuffle was turned on.
properties.name: preserveLayoutWhenShuffling

properties.description: If true, guarantees that when pages are added to a spread it will contain a maximum of two pages. If false, allows pages to be added or moved into existing spreads. For override information, see preserve layout when shuffling.
properties.name: allowPageShuffle

properties.description: If true, overprints black when saving the document.
properties.name: overprintBlack

properties.description: If true, locks column guides.
properties.name: columnGuideLocked

properties.description: The starting page number for a document. This is the same as the starting page number for the first section of a document. Default value is 1.
properties.name: startPageNumber

properties.description: The intent for a document.
properties.name: intent

properties.description: The placement of the page binding.
properties.name: pageBinding

properties.description: The direction of text in the column.
properties.name: columnDirection

properties.description: The size of the page.
properties.name: pageSize

properties.description: If true, causes UI-based snippet import to use original location for page items.
properties.name: snippetImportUsesOriginalLocation

properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.
properties.name: properties

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the DocumentPreference.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
methods.name: getElements

parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler
